text: atamutaiya makkale! Saittan unkal perror iruvaraiyum, avarkalutaiya manattai avarkal parkkumaru avarkalutaiya ataiyai avarkalai vittum, kalaintu, cuvanapatiyai vittu veliyerriyatu pol avan unkalai (emarric) cotanaikkullakka ventam; niccayamaka avanum, avan kuttattarum unkalaik kavanittuk kontirukkirarkal - ninkal avarkalaip parkka mutiyatavaru meyyakave nam saittankalai nampikkaiyillatavarin nanparkalakki irukkirom
